channel.title: R on Geochemistry programming
channel.description: Recent content in R on Geochemistry programming

item.title: Geochem modeling of Ig. Processes - Chapter 2
item.description: Introduction 2.1. Loading and Manipulating Data Exercise 2.1: Subsetting a numeric vector, vector operations Excercise 2.2: Loading files, matrix/data frame manipulations 2.2. Linking Whole-Rock Chemistry with Mineral Stoichiometry Exercise 2.3: Calculating simple indexes 2.3. Statistics Exercise 2.4: Simple statistics 2.4. Classification and Grouping - Using Factors Exercise 2.5. Using factors to deal with complex datasets I Exercise 2.6. Using factors to deal with complex datasets II Excercise 2.

item.title: R Syntax in a Nutshell Part I
item.description: Seeking help Object types Numeric Vectors Character Vectors Arrays, Matrices, Data Frames Indexing/subsetting of Vectors, Arrays and Data Frames Seeking help Here demonstrate how to seek help in R programing. These keywords include: help(), ?, apropos and example. help(plot) ?plot apropos("plot") #Commands related to "plot" ## [1] "assocplot" "barplot" "barplot.default" ## [4] "biplot" "boxplot" "boxplot.default" ## [7] "boxplot.matrix" "boxplot.stats" "cdplot" ## [10] "coplot" "fourfoldplot" "interaction.plot" ## [13] "lag.
